alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Tioga; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:58PM EDT until July 24 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Seneca County in central New York... Schuyler County in central New York... Southeastern Yates County in central New York... Northeastern Chemung County in central New York... Central Tioga County in central New York... Tompkins County in central New York... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 358 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tyrone to near Millport to near Breesport, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ithaca, Newfield, Hector, Cayuga Heights, Starkey, Lansing, Enfield, Danby, Caroline and Covert. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Tioga; Tompkins; Yates
